alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 27 at 8:09PM EDT until further notice by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The Florida Keys * WHEN...Through early Wednesday morning * IMPACTS...Excessive rainfall may result in flooding of poor drainage and low-lying locations. Storm drains may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Some locations along the island chain have already received 5 to 7 inches of rainfall. An additional 3 to 5 inches of rain is possible through Wednesday morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
